text: Ramón Covarrubias Garza (born December 8, 1945), known by his stage name Ramón Ayala, is a Mexican singer, composer and songwriter of Norteño music. ==References== Notes Bibliography * * ==External links== * Ramón Ayala website * MusicWorld biography * Ramon Ayala Biography Category:1945 births Category:Grammy Award winners Category:Latin Grammy Award winners Category:Living people Category:Mexican accordionists Category:Mexican male singers Category:Mexican songwriters Category:Male songwriters Category:Musicians from Monterrey Category:Norteño musicians Category:21st- century accordionists Category:21st-century male musicians
title: Ramón Ayala
